text: (Napiye!) Umatu iraivan vanavarkalai nokki “nan pumiyil (en) piratinitiyai (atamai) niccayamaka erpatuttap pokinran'' enak kuriya camayattil (atarku) avarkal “(pumiyil) visamam ceytu irattam cintakkutiya (cantatikalaip perum) avarai atil (un piratinitiyaka) akkukiraya? Nankalo un paricuttat tanmaiyaikkuri un pukalaikkontu unnaip pukalntu kontirukkirom'' enru kurinarkal. Atarku avan “ninkal ariyatavarrai ellam niccayamaka nan nankariven'' enak kurivittan
